forgotPasswordEmail.title: Forgot your password? ðŸ¤«
forgotPasswordEmail.subTitle: Enter your email or username and we'll send you a code to get back into your account.

forgotPasswordVerifyCode.title: Enter the code
forgotPasswordVerifyCode.subTitle: To change your password, you need to enter the code we just sent to your email address.

forgotPasswordChangePassword.title: Set your new password
forgotPasswordChangePassword.subTitle: Your password must be at least 6 characters and should include a combination of numbers, letters and special characters (!$@%).

forgotPasswordFinished.title: Password reset complete
forgotPasswordFinished.subTitle: Your password has been set. You may go ahead now.
